title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] United Airlines: Operational Excellence with AWS (SPS317)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 联合航空：借助 AWS 实现卓越运营 (SPS317)
abstract: Join United Airlines and AWS leaders as they share how AWS Unified Operations transformed United’s approach to managing mission-critical systems. Learn how United enhanced their operational resilience through proactive architectural guidance, rapid incident response, and continuous improvement practices. Discover the journey of implementing a new support model that combines context-aware expertise to prevent issues and accelerate resolution. This session offers valuable insights for executives managing complex technology landscapes who want to improve architectural and operational excellence while enabling innovation. See how United’s success story can inform your organization’s path to enhanced operational reliability.
abstract_cn: 加入联合航空和AWS领导者的行列，了解AWS统一运营如何改变联合航空管理关键任务系统的方式。了解联合航空如何通过主动的架构指导、快速的事件响应和持续改进实践来增强其运营韧性。探索实施新支持模型的历程，该模型结合了情境感知专业知识来预防问题并加速解决方案。本次会议为管理复杂技术环境的高管提供宝贵见解，帮助他们在实现创新的同时提高架构和运营卓越性。了解联合航空的成功案例如何为您的组织增强运营可靠性的路径提供参考。

presenter.name: Jason Bower
presenter.title: Director AWS Field Support N. America

presenter.name: Ninos Gabriel
presenter.title: Managing Director, Enterprise Architecture and Strategic Platforms
